tours.name: Exotic Kerala trip for 5 Nights - Soulmate Special
tours.info: Pleasant and comfortable weather in Cochin and Dry and pleasant weather in Munnar.you can also expect Pleasant weather throughout the day along with cool temperatures in Thekkady and Moderate and mild temperatures with slight humidity in Alleppey.

tours.name: A Relaxing holiday to Kerala (Honeymoon Special)
tours.info: Visiting the tourist spots and indulging in adventure sports in Cochin and Neelakurinji flowers and green vegetation in Munnar .You will also like Bird watching, elephant riding, boating, and plantation tours in Thekkady and Exploring the backwaters and houseboat stays in Alleppey .
